snippet.title: Nexomon coming to PC (Steam)! November 29th 2019!
snippet.description:
Hello all tamers! We are pleased to announce that Nexomon and Nexomon 2 will be coming to PC (Steam)! Nexomon will be available on Steam on November 29th! We will list Nexomon 2 later this month. In addition to this, we will be sending a Google Form link for those who are interested in Beta testing Nexomon 2 on all platforms! (later this month via social media).

***Please support Nexomon and Wishlist the game ! :)***
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1191580/Nexomon/

Nexomon for PC will feature:

- Full controller & keyboard support.
- Improved graphics and resolution.
- No ads or in-app purchases.
- Automatic Steam Cloud saves.

Thank you very much for your patience and support!
